## CardContainer.onRemove() method

Called when a card is to be removed from this container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected abstract onRemove(card: TCard): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  card | TCard | Card to remove. |
